item.title: CVE-2023-37393|2024-08-02T17:09:34.227Z -- atarim -- visual%20website%20collaboration%2C%20feedback%20%26%20project%20management%20%E2%80%93%20atarim
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Atarim Visual Website Collaboration, Feedback & Project Management – Atarim plugin <= 3.9.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-37434|2024-08-02T03:57:38.932Z -- atarim -- atarim
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Atarim allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Atarim: from n/a through 3.31.
